医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示年轻结直肠癌患者面临的独特挑战患有结肠癌的年轻人往往在晚期才被诊断出来，并且肿瘤类型更具侵袭性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Studies-reveal-unique-challenges-faced-by-younger-病人-with-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Studies-reveal-unique-challenges-faced-by-younger-病人-with-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1b8f1eb-c621-49fd-8c2d-e038e005b547 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 16:14:00 -0400 Studies reveal unique challenges faced by younger patients with colorectal cancer
乳腺癌患者面临着一些未得到满足的情感和经济问题尽管乳腺癌是女性中最常见的非皮肤癌，但在治疗期间和生存期间寻求支持可能非常具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Breast-cancer-病人-struggle-with-several-unmet-emotional-and-financial-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Breast-cancer-病人-struggle-with-several-unmet-emotional-and-financial-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c95c2546-f9b6-4094-a7e4-cfdff10782eb Fri, 18 Oct 2024 16:06:00 -0400 Breast cancer patients struggle with several unmet emotional and financial concerns
老年手术验证计划可降低手术后死亡率根据在 ACS 临床大会上发表的两项研究，实施美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 老年手术验证 (GSV) 计划可以降低手术后死亡率，并增加符合高级护理指示等记录标准的患者比例2024 年在加利福尼亚州旧金山举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Geriatric-Surgery-Verification-program-reduces-rates-of-death-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Geriatric-Surgery-Verification-program-reduces-rates-of-death-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d06eb905-4604-4425-8934-eadc0bb9bb02 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:56:00 -0400 Geriatric Surgery Verification program reduces rates of death after surgery
新技术增强了对染色质组织的理解加州大学圣地亚哥分校表观基因组学中心 (C4E) 的研究人员开发了一种名为 Droplet Hi-C 的新技术，使科学家能够快速确定染色质组织，即细胞内遗传物质的排列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-technique-enhances-understanding-of-chromatin-organization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-technique-enhances-understanding-of-chromatin-organization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ab93a33-499d-43b6-bbc8-cdc8e5d8897a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:49:00 -0400 New technique enhances understanding of chromatin organization
音乐有助于手术后恢复正在寻找一种创造性的方法来加速手术康复？根据在加利福尼亚州旧金山举行的 2024 年美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 临床大会上发表的研究，关键可能在于听音乐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Music-aids-recovery-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Music-aids-recovery-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b48b84c-404b-44c2-bd8e-b09217eb11ca Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:37:00 -0400 Music aids recovery after surgery
真实世界数据凸显 RSV 疫苗的有效性《柳叶刀》上发表的一项多州研究是对 RSV（呼吸道合胞病毒的缩写）疫苗有效性的首批真实世界数据分析之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Real-world-data-highlights-efficiency-of-RSV-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Real-world-data-highlights-efficiency-of-RSV-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c4ee965-d2ac-4cf8-87e2-a2d6a0a1aba1 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:30:00 -0400 Real world data highlights effectiveness of RSV vaccine
古代DNA揭示了淀粉消化的见解如果您曾经努力减少碳水化合物的摄入量，那么古老的 DNA 可能是罪魁祸首。人们早就知道，人类携带一个基因的多个拷贝，该基因使我们能够开始在口腔中分解复杂的碳水化合物淀粉，从而为代谢面包和面食等淀粉类食物提供了第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Ancient-DNA-reveals-insights-into-starch-digestion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Ancient-DNA-reveals-insights-into-starch-digestion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d4e1112-e388-43e5-8bff-b759a9583683 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:23:00 -0400 Ancient DNA reveals insights into starch digestion
妇女健康倡议继续提供丰富的营养见解妇女健康倡议 (WHI) 是一项针对 161,808 名绝经后妇女的里程碑式研究，已持续 40 多年，继续为营养科学的进步贡献丰富的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-Womens-Health-Initiative-continues-to-provide-a-wealth-of-nutrition-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-Womens-Health-Initiative-continues-to-provide-a-wealth-of-nutrition-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53282f0a-d69b-4fc8-bce6-6c63b7131430 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:16:00 -0400 The Women's Health Initiative continues to provide a wealth of nutrition insights
内分泌学会和 Keystone 研讨会将主办推进内分泌研究的会议内分泌学会是一个促进内分泌学研究和临床实践的全球组织，而 Keystone Symposia 是一个关于一系列生命科学和生物医学主题的会议和研讨会的非营利组织，它们将联合主办一系列三场会议，以推进内分泌研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Endocrine-Society-and-Keystone-Symposia-to-host-conferences-for-advancing-endocrine-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Endocrine-Society-and-Keystone-Symposia-to-host-conferences-for-advancing-endocrine-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84740b37-1bea-4486-afcc-836fb78ae431 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:09:00 -0400 Endocrine Society and Keystone Symposia to host conferences for advancing endocrine research
DNA条形码揭示隐藏的物种多样性就物种而言，地球是一个几乎难以想象的多样化星球。研究人员已经识别出两到三百万个物种，但还有更多我们一无所知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/DNA-barcoding-reveals-hidden-species-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/DNA-barcoding-reveals-hidden-species-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0463132-ed9f-49ab-abfd-eb028349b401 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:00:00 -0400 DNA barcoding reveals hidden species diversity
